mapper.sql:
action.id as action_id,action.create_time as action_create_time,action.create_user as action_create_user,action.remove as action_remove,action.update_time as action_update_time,action.update_user as action_update_user,action.code as action_code,action.name as action_name,action.url as action_url, action.tree_id as action_tree_id
,tree.title as tree_title,tree.code as tree_code,tree.order_num as tree_order_num,tree.leaf as tree_leaf,tree.parent_line as tree_parent_line,tree.id as tree_id,tree.remove as tree_remove,tree.create_time as tree_create_time,tree.update_time as tree_update_time,tree.create_user as tree_create_user,tree.update_user as tree_update_user

select top 1
from t_action action
left join t_${domain.tableName} ${domain.tableAlia} on action.${domain.tableAlia}_id = ${domain.tableAlia}.id and ${domain.tableAlia}.remove = 0
left join t_${domain.tableName} ${domain.tableAlia} on action.id = ${domain.tableAlia}.${domain.joinField}_id and ${domain.tableAlia}.remove = 0
left join ${domain.middleTable} ${domain.middleTable}_alis on action.id=${domain.middleTable}_alis.action_id left join t_${domain.tableName} ${domain.tableAlia} on ${domain.tableAlia}.id = ${domain.middleTable}_alis.${domain.invertJoinId} and ${domain.tableAlia}.remove = 0
where 1=1
and ${condition}
${condition},
mapper.select:
select top 1
from t_action action
left join t_${domain.tableName} ${domain.tableAlia} on action.${domain.tableAlia}_id = ${domain.tableAlia}.id and ${domain.tableAlia}.remove = 0
left join t_${domain.tableName} ${domain.tableAlia} on action.id = ${domain.tableAlia}.${domain.joinField}_id and ${domain.tableAlia}.remove = 0
left join ${domain.middleTable} ${domain.middleTable}_alis on action.id=${domain.middleTable}_alis.action_id left join t_${domain.tableName} ${domain.tableAlia} on ${domain.tableAlia}.id = ${domain.middleTable}_alis.${domain.invertJoinId} and ${domain.tableAlia}.remove = 0
where action.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

with dd as (select distinct ${orderFields} from t_action action
left join t_${domain.tableName} ${domain.tableAlia} on action.${domain.tableAlia}_id = ${domain.tableAlia}.id and ${domain.tableAlia}.remove = 0
left join t_${domain.tableName} ${domain.tableAlia} on action.id = ${domain.tableAlia}.${domain.joinField}_id and ${domain.tableAlia}.remove = 0
left join ${domain.middleTable} ${domain.middleTable}_alis on action.id=${domain.middleTable}_alis.action_id left join t_${domain.tableName} ${domain.tableAlia} on ${domain.tableAlia}.id = ${domain.middleTable}_alis.${domain.invertJoinId} and ${domain.tableAlia}.remove = 0
where 1 = 1
and ${condition}
${condition},
offset ${startIndex} rows fetch next ${length} rows only) select from t_action action
left join t_${domain.tableName} ${domain.tableAlia} on action.${domain.tableAlia}_id = ${domain.tableAlia}.id and ${domain.tableAlia}.remove = 0
left join t_${domain.tableName} ${domain.tableAlia} on action.id = ${domain.tableAlia}.${domain.joinField}_id and ${domain.tableAlia}.remove = 0
left join ${domain.middleTable} ${domain.middleTable}_alis on action.id=${domain.middleTable}_alis.action_id left join t_${domain.tableName} ${domain.tableAlia} on ${domain.tableAlia}.id = ${domain.middleTable}_alis.${domain.invertJoinId} and ${domain.tableAlia}.remove = 0
where exists(select 1 from dd where dd.id = action.id)
${condition},

select count(1) total from ( select top 1 distinct ${fields} from t_action action
left join t_${domain.tableName} ${domain.tableAlia} on action.${domain.tableAlia}_id = ${domain.tableAlia}.id and ${domain.tableAlia}.remove = 0
left join t_${domain.tableName} ${domain.tableAlia} on action.id = ${domain.tableAlia}.${domain.joinField}_id and ${domain.tableAlia}.remove = 0
left join ${domain.middleTable} ${domain.middleTable}_alis on action.id=${domain.middleTable}_alis.action_id left join t_${domain.tableName} ${domain.tableAlia} on ${domain.tableAlia}.id = ${domain.middleTable}_alis.${domain.invertJoinId} and ${domain.tableAlia}.remove = 0
where 1=1
and ${condition}
${condition},
) as s
mapper.update: update t_action set remove = 1 , update_time=#{updateTime} , update_user=#{updateUser} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_action (create_time, create_user, remove, update_time, update_user, code, name, url, tree_id) values (#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remove,jdbcType=BIT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tree.id,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into t_action
create_time,
create_user,

update_user,

name,
url,

mapper.update:
update t_action
create_time = #{domain.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{domain.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remove = #{domain.remove,jdbcType=BIT},
update_time = #{domain.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{domain.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{domain.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{domain.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{domain.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tree_id = #{domain.tree.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
${condition}

update t_action set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remove = #{remove,jdbcType=BIT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tree_id = #{tree.id,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
